sentence.Network_en: I wish I'd had the eloquence of Helmut Schmidt.
sentence.Network_cn: 我希望自己像赫尔穆特·施密特一样能言善辩。

sentence.Network_en: She was struck by his simple, spellbinding eloquence.
sentence.Network_cn: 她被他那率直、富有鼓动性的口才迷住了。

sentence.Network_en: I am afraid my eloquence did not avail against the facts.
sentence.Network_cn: 恐怕我的雄辩也无补于事实了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... colloquium n 学术讨论会 eloquence n 雄辩，口才 interlocution n 对话.
口字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 口不应心〖 wordsnotagreeingwiththeheart〗 口才〖 eloquence〗 口称〖 claim〗.
wit 才智,创作才能eloquence 文才lyricism 抒情性
drought 粗糙的，大致的，粗暴的eloquence 雄辩，口才，修辞tedious 单调乏味的，沉闷的

list.abs: No one can rival him in eloquence ., 在口才方面没有人能与他匹敌.
她是个很能干的人 She's a real go-getter.(指能干的人)她口才很好 She's eloquent她是个博览群书的人 She is a well-read girl
he addressed theaudience in an eloquent speech ., 他向听众发表了雄辩的演说.
unprofitable eloquence is like the cypress and tall , but bears no fruit .无益的雄辩如同高大的柏树，不会结果。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin eloquentia, from eloqui 'speak out', from e- (variant of ex-) 'out' + loqui 'speak'

entry.tran: （言辞、文字等）表达生动的，有说服力的
entry.def: Speech or writing that is eloquent is well expressed and effective in persuading people.

example.ex: I heard him make a very eloquent speech at that dinner.
example.tran: 在那次晚宴上，我听到他作了一番非常有说服力的陈词。

entry.tran: 雄辩的;口才流利的;能言善辩的
entry.def: A person who is eloquent is good at speaking and able to persuade people.

example.ex: He was eloquent about his love of books.
example.tran: 他说起自己对书的喜爱来就会停不住嘴。
非常能言善辩的德国评论家

auth_sentence.content: His eloquence becoming more and more licentious and vituperative.
auth_sentence.res_content: His eloquence becoming more and more licentious and vituperative.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His eloquence becoming more and more licentious and vituperative.

auth_sentence.content: Incident...narrative...eloquence,sall perfectly symmetrized with incomparable artistic skill.
auth_sentence.res_content: Incident...narrative...eloquence,sall perfectly symmetrized with incomparable artistic skill.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Incident...narrative...eloquence,sall perfectly symmetrized with incomparable artistic skill.

auth_sentence.content: Nor did she attempt the solace of aphoristic eloquence.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor did she attempt the solace of aphoristic eloquence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor did she attempt the solace of aphoristic eloquence.

sentences.en: Unprofitable eloquence is like the cypress,which is great and tall,but bears no fruit.
sentences.cn: 无益的雄辩犹如柏树,虽然高大但不结果。

sentences.en: Wealth of words is not eloquence.
Discretion in speech is more than eloquence.
sentences.cn: 出言慎重胜过口若悬河。
